episode_type.description: Episode that captures the execution of a scenario/skill/template (what was done and with what result).
Episode that captures a plan or strategy to be executed later.
Episode that captures a security-relevant event, policy evaluation or guard decision.
Other episode type not covered by the core set. Should be combined with a clear subtype.

rules.description: Episode type should be either a core id (execution, plan, security_event, other) or core_id/subtype.

meta.note: Core dictionary of MOVA episode types for 4.1. Domain-specific schemas should use core ids with subtypes, e.g. execution/file_cleanup, plan/task.
